name: Game Demo (Polar0)
description:
This is the Extremely Early Demo of my game which currently has no name.
This game is gettting updated daily by me a indie game developer.

If you have any problems whith the game please contact me by dropping a comment.

                                                                             COMING SOON

 A menu including ;
  Settings

  Credits

  Quit

  Start

 A art clean up including:

  New Character animations 

  Parallax backround

  New tiles

  Skins

Some Sfx to    

UPDATES
Decelleration speed increased for snappier movement.

NEW

One more new level

Wall jumping added!

CONTROLS

Right Arrow Key to move right
Left Arrow Key to move left
Space Bar to jump.
 
EXTRA
Try clicking the game if the arrow keys arent working.
